name: EMPlifier
description:
EMPlifier is a game about avoiding and collecting magnetic projectiles that move to the beat of the game's music. Players change colour in order to change their polarity, and attempt to get the highest possible score by avoiding projectiles that are the wrong colour and collecting projectiles of the same colour.

Controls =| WASD - Movement | E - change polarity(colour) | SPACE - Dash(subtle) |

The game is currently being developed by CagaluBEAT.

This game is currently in open alpha!
